1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Ek Nanad Ki Khushiyon Ki Chaabi... Meri Bhabhi (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

123.title: Kamini slaps Kunal

episode of.title: Ek Nanad Ki Khushiyon Ki Chaabi... Meri Bhabhi (TV Series 2013– )

123.plot: Zorawar asks Shraddha whether she wants to marry Kunal. Kamini rebukes Shraddha on learning about her wish. Zorawar asks Kamini to leave his house.

136.title: Amrit and Zorawar ask Anand to bring Kritika back to the house

episode of.title: Ek Nanad Ki Khushiyon Ki Chaabi... Meri Bhabhi (TV Series 2013– )

136.plot: Amrit informs the family that Kritika has refused to return home. Shraddha apologizes to Kritika for her mistake and asks her to return home.

145.title: The Shergill Family Celebrates the New Year Party

episode of.title: Ek Nanad Ki Khushiyon Ki Chaabi... Meri Bhabhi (TV Series 2013– )

145.plot: Kunal's friends inquire him about Shraddha. Kunal and Shraddha attend the party with their friends. Meanwhile, the Shergill family celebrates the new year party with their friends.

146.title: Anand and Kritika Quarrel with Each Other

episode of.title: Ek Nanad Ki Khushiyon Ki Chaabi... Meri Bhabhi (TV Series 2013– )

146.plot: Shraddha and Kunal play dumb charades and convey their messages to each other. Later, they formally wish each other on the occasion of new year.

147.title: Anand Assumes That Kritika Wants a Divorce from Him

episode of.title: Ek Nanad Ki Khushiyon Ki Chaabi... Meri Bhabhi (TV Series 2013– )

147.plot: Zorawar insists Anand to sign on the divorce papers. Shraddha tries to convince Anand not to sign on the divorce papers. Anand assumes that Kritika wants a divorce from him and throws the divorce papers on her face.

148.title: Kritika and Anand Sign on the Divorce Papers

episode of.title: Ek Nanad Ki Khushiyon Ki Chaabi... Meri Bhabhi (TV Series 2013– )

148.plot: Kritika requests her parents to leave. Amrit and Zorawar decide to inform Kamini and Purshottam about their plan, but in vain.

149.title: Kunal Sneaks Into Shraddha's House

episode of.title: Ek Nanad Ki Khushiyon Ki Chaabi... Meri Bhabhi (TV Series 2013– )

149.plot: Anand and Kritika miss each other. Zorawar informs Jaspreet that Anand and Kritika have signed the divorce papers. Ishaan asks Jaya to stop Kritika from leaving the house.

150.title: Dhruv finds Kunal with Shraddha

episode of.title: Ek Nanad Ki Khushiyon Ki Chaabi... Meri Bhabhi (TV Series 2013– )

150.plot: Shraddha becomes shocked on seeing Kunal. Kritika suffers a sprain in her leg as Anand collides with her.

imdb.plot outline: Ek Nanad Ki Khushiyon Ki Chaabi, Meri Bhabhi is a show about the lovely bond shared between a sister-in-law and daughter-in-law. Shraddha the nanad finds a friend in Kritika her bhabhi. Kritika is a loving person and a dutiful bahu of the Shergill family. She knows how to keep the family together. She is gentle, understanding and is very good at relieving tense moments with her humor. She is the most perfect house wife. Kritika plays a significant role in the life of Shraddha and shows her how to live with her head held high in difficult circumstances.
imdb.title: Ek Nanad Ki Khushiyon Ki Chaabi... Meri Bhabhi

plot: Ek Nanad Ki Khushiyon Ki Chaabi, Meri Bhabhi is a show about the lovely bond shared between a sister-in-law and daughter-in-law. Shraddha the nanad finds a friend in Kritika her bhabhi. Kritika is a loving person and a dutiful bahu of the Shergill family. She knows how to keep the family together. She is gentle, understanding and is very good at relieving tense moments with her humor. She is the most perfect house wife. Kritika plays a significant role in the life of Shraddha and shows her how to live with her head held high in difficult circumstances.::Varun
